title: Same Order Invoice Number
description: Consistent order, invoice, shipment, and credit memo numbers. Avoid confusing your customers and support staff by using consistent order numbers. By default, Magento assigns a separate number to orders and related documents (invoices, shipments, and credit memos). Once installed, this extension ensures that when a new invoice, shipment, or credit memo is created, it will always take the same number as the associated order.

title: Admitad Tracking
description: Admitad¬†is an affiliate network that provides technical and organisational tools to carry out advertising campaigns involving a large number of publishers. We know affiliate marketing inside out and are happy to share the latest insights. If you want to increase sales of your product or to attract additional customers, become an Admitad partner.

title: CardGate Payments
description: CardGate¬†is a payment service provider based in The Netherlands.¬†We make it possible for consumers to pay safely and secure in webshops and we assist merchants to accept online payments.¬†At this moment we serve more than 21000 webshops worldwide. We have an international (bank) license and can provide all the payment methods you need to do business all over the world. These are local European payment methods, ¬†but also international payment methods, such as creditcards. We process creditcards in house which means we don‚Äôt use an acquiring bank.

title: Prisync Dynamic Pricing
description: Prisync¬†is a competitor¬†price tracking¬†and¬†dynamic pricing software¬†for e-commerce companies of all sizes from all around the world. Since the company‚Äôs founding in 2013, Prisync tracks more than 5 million URLs every day and has customers in more than 50 countries.

title: Athena Search
description: Athena Search is an advanced, SaaS-based search platform built for eCommerce that provides fast, accurate, and relevant search results. It is developed by SyncIt Group is a software development company, a Magento Business Solution Partner and an Adobe Solution Partner.
category: Extensions, Content & Customizations, Site Search & Navigation

title: Authorize.Net CIM With Stored Cards
description: Authorize.Net is one of the world\'s largest payment gateways, serving over 400,000 merchants. Their services allow you to accept payment from your customers, by credit card or eCheck, straight from your website.¬†This extension brings Authorize.Net\'s Customer Information Manager (CIM)¬†service to Magento 2. Authorize.Net CIM takes payment processing to a whole new level, by allowing your customers to store their payment info on Authorize.Net\'s secure servers. This gives you and your customers the convenience of stored credit cards, with all the security of Authorize.Net. It also allows us to give you many advanced features that most payment methods aren\'t capable of.

title: Braintree Subscription
description: Braintree helps businesses of all sizes, from small to large enterprises, accept and process payments to help maximize business opportunities and revenue growth. Companies around the world benefit from the technology and support of Braintree coupled with the scale, backing, and confidence of partnering with a PayPal service.
category: Extensions, Payments & Security, Checkout Enhancements, Payment Integration

title: Order Manager
description: IWD\'s Order Manager extension provides an effective and efficient way for merchants to manage their Magento orders. In the event, for example, a customer would like to change their shipping address or billing address¬†then the Order Manager would permit merchants to quickly apply these order modifications without having to delete the original order and create a new order.

title: i95Dev Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations Connect
description: i95Dev Connect provides seamless eCommerce integration between Adobe Commerce/ Magento Commerce and Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations ERP systems. It combines the scalability and intelligence of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance with the flexibility and features of Adobe Commerce/ Magento, driving operational efficiency and unparalleled customer experience.

title: Dynamics 365 Business Central Connect
description: i95Dev‚Äôs Dynamics 365 Business Central Connect is the most comprehensive out-of-box integration solution between Adobe Commerce/ Magento and ¬†Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central ERP systems.

title: i95Dev SAP Business One Connect
description: i95Dev\'s SAP Business One Connect provides seamless integration between Adobe Commerce/ Magento and SAP Business One ERP systems (both SQL and HANA databases).

title: Sezzle
description: Sezzle is an alternative payment platform that increases sales and basket sizes by enabling your customers to \'buy now and pay later\' with interest-free installment plans. Sezzle collects 25% of the purchase price from the consumer at the time of purchase, but pays the merchant the full purchase price upfront, less their fee. The merchant assumes no credit or fraud risk. Sezzle then schedules three additional installments of 25% to be automatically debited from the consumer every two weeks, completely interest- and fee-free.

title: Skrill Hosted Payment Solution
description: Skrill has been making digital payments simple, secure and quick since 2001. We‚Äôre an acknowledged world-leader in developing global payment solutions. We meet the needs of businesses worldwide, helping them build a global customer base and drive growth.

title: Forter Fraud Prevention Platform
description: Forter is the leader in e-commerce fraud prevention, protecting over $150 billion in online commerce transactions for over 620 million consumers globally from credit card fraud, account takeover, identity theft, and more. The company‚Äôs identity-based fraud prevention solution detects fraudulent activity in real-time, throughout all online consumer experiences. Forter‚Äôs integrated fraud prevention platform is fed by its rapidly growing Global Merchant Network, underpinned by predictive fraud research and modeling, and the ability for customers to tailor the platform for their specific needs. As a result, Forter is trusted by Fortune 500 companies to deliver exceptional accuracy, smoother user experience and elevated sales at a much lower cost.

title: Featured FAQ
description: A clean, interactive FAQ page is a must-have for every eCommerce website. It is often the second most visited page after the Home Page by the users. To win your visitors, you need to ensure that you are not leaving them with any unanswered question. FAQs are a great help here as you can document your knowledge and present them to the visitors in a user-friendly way.
category: Extensions, Content & Customizations, Personalization & Experience Management, Product Content, Rich Media

title: Advance Minicart
description: The Advance Minicart from the house of Grazitti is one of the most essential and crucial elements of a website. While the default mini cart provides you with an overview of the cart, the Advance Minicart offers many additional features. To begin with, it pops up when you click on the cart icon placed on the right corner of the website. Since it is on the most noticeable corner of your online store, your users never lose track of it while scrolling. It unlocks many other features to improve user experience and stand out in the competitive online market.

title: AccurateTax Sales Tax
description: AccurateTax.com is a solely-owned venture from NetBlazon, a premier provider of e-commerce products and services founded in 1998. ¬†Our first venture into online sales tax came in 2002 when we developed a sales tax module for another shopping cart platform. It was called Zip Based Sales Tax, and it gave merchants the ability to charge different sales tax rates by 5-digit zipcodes. At the time, it was a breakthrough for that cart. Before ‚ÄúZip Tax‚Äù, as it was affectionately known, all retailers had to either charge one state-wide rate or ask customers to select the appropriate rate. (Guess how often that worked out?) Even at the time, basing sales tax on zip code wasn‚Äôt very precise, but it was a step in the right direction.

title: Review Images Extension
description:
Product review extension for Magento 2 is a module or plugin that extends the default review and rating functionality of the Magento 2 e-commerce platform. It is designed to enhance the customer experience and provide additional features for managing product reviews and ratings. Here are some common features you might find in a product review extension:
 
 ¬† ¬† Advanced Review Management: These extensions often provide a user-friendly interface for both customers and administrators to manage product reviews. Customers can submit reviews with ease, and administrators can moderate, edit, or delete reviews as needed.
 
 ¬† ¬† Rating System: The extension typically supports a star rating system, allowing customers to rate products on a scale of 1 to 5 stars, helping other shoppers make informed decisions.
 
 ¬† ¬† Detailed Reviews: Customers can write detailed text reviews, sharing their experiences, feedback, and any additional information about the product. They might also be able to upload images or videos alongside their reviews.
 
 ¬† ¬† Review Sorting and Filtering: Customers can sort and filter reviews based on criteria like "Most Helpful," "Newest," or "Highest Rated." This makes it easier for shoppers to find the most relevant information.
 
 ¬† ¬† Review Widgets: Some extensions include review widgets that can be placed on product pages, category pages, or other areas of the site, showcasing product ratings and review snippets.

Zip\'s platform is entirely digital and leverages big data in its proprietorial fraud and credit decision technology to deliver real-time consumer responses with same-day settlement for merchants.The Zip payments extension enables Zip‚Äôs products as an alternate payment method in your Magento store. This extension allows customers to buy now, and pay later using the Zip service. The extension supports the responsive, in-context mode which provides a seamless checkout experience without a customer ever having to leave the checkout page to complete their Zip application process. Customers can sign up for new accounts or login with an existing account from the in-context popup. title: Category Code
description: By default, a category in Magento 2 is uniquely identified by its ID. This can lead to some issue because the ID of a category can be different from one environment to another: for example, if the category has been deleted and then recreated, or if several categories have been created by hand but in a different order. The main purpose of the Category Code extension for Magento 2 is to have a unique identifier to manage categories. For that, this extension will add a "code" attribute to categories. Once this attribute has been created, it will be easy for a developer to load a specific category without using its ID or even worse, its name.

title: LayUp Digital Layby Solution
description: LayUp is an alternative payment platform that increases sales and basket size by enabling your customers to lay-by/layaway items with interest-free installment plans. With LayUp‚Äôs module, you can allow buyers to pay in installments for products or services that suit your business rules. Through the configuration settings, you simply define your business rules through two separate settings; the deposit down payment percentage and the final payment date as to when you want your customer to have paid up by. Our extension includes a payment widget, which will be enabled as a payment option in your checkout. Once a customer selects ‚ÄúPay it off with LayUp‚Äù as their payment option, they are redirected to our secure checkout, after which they are taken back to your store to view their purchase details. The extension also includes a widget that displays a dynamic installment amount on your product and cart pages, which is proven to increase conversions and basket size. Once your customer has chosen the ‚ÄúPay it off with LayUp‚Äù payment option, they will be directed to a customized payment widget page where they are able to toggle between weekly or monthly installments. They can also select the day of the week or month they will like to be billed on throughout the payment plan period as well as their being total transparency and clarity of what the future installments are going to be.¬†When your customer is ready to activate their payment plan, they can choose between paying via credit/ debit card or instant EFT. After the customer has successfully gone through 3D secure process and verified themselves they will be redirected back to your store to view their purchase details and the order will be put into a ‚Äúplaced‚Äù state. If the customer is declined for whatever reason, the item will be put back in-stock to be sold in the future.

If this signal passes curation, the IP is then redistributed to all users sharing a similar technological profile to "immunize" them against this IP.

You can explicitly block or allow sets of email domains, IP ranges, or suspicious patterns in usernames, and set a maximum username length. You can also fully customize the error message that is displayed to the end-user when their registration has been blocked. This extension is compatible with single-site and multi-site Magento stores, as well as GraphQL-based headless solutions.

title: Anti-Spam By CleanTalk
description: CleanTalk anti-spam extension works with the cloud service and you ¬†need an account and an access key. The account is created from the ¬†extension settings and you get the access key automatically, or you can do it rvice makes a decision - to post the visitor\'s message or to define it as spam and reject it. All requests are recorded in the antispam log and you can view and analyze them.

title: 404 Notifier
description: 404 is a common error on web pages. It is because the requested page is not available on the server. 404 page not found error occurs due to reasons like page not exists, server down, poor internet connection, wrong URL, broken links, webpage address change. 404 pages create a bad impression and you lose potential customers. Hence, it is necessary for store owners to manage 404 pages of the store.

title: Peakhour
description: Peakhour¬†provides a website acceleration service that can optimize and cache content on its global ANYCast network. We integrate mod page speed so images can be automatically resized and recompressed, ¬†Javascript/CSS/HTML minified, zipped and much much more. Our global CDN can also cache dynamic content and can be customized for different sections of your site using powerful page rules.
